genetic_profile_description: Protein expression measured by reverse-phase protein array
Protein or phosphoprotein level (Z-scores) measured by reverse phase protein array (RPPA)
Mutation data from whole exome sequencing.
Methylation (HM450) beta-values for genes in 155 cases. For genes with multiple methylation probes, the probe most anti-correlated with expression.
Methylation (HM27) beta-values for genes in 285 cases. For genes with multiple methylation probes, the probe most anti-correlated with expression.
Relative linear copy-number values for each gene (from Affymetrix SNP6).

genetic_profile_name: mRNA Expression z-Scores (RNA Seq V2 RSEM)
genetic_profile_description: mRNA z-Scores (RNA Seq V2 RSEM) compared to the expression distribution of each gene tumors that are diploid for this gene.
Expression levels for 20532 genes in 166 gbm cases (RNA Seq V2 RSEM).
mRNA z-Scores (Agilent microarray) compared to the expression distribution of each gene tumors that are diploid for this gene.
mRNA z-Scores  (U133 microarray only) compared to the expression distribution of each gene tumors that are diploid for this gene.
mRNA expression data from the Affymetrix U133 microarray.
Putative copy-number calls on 577 cases determined using GISTIC 2.0. Values: -2 = homozygous deletion; -1 = hemizygous deletion; 0 = neutral / no change; 1 = gain; 2 = high level amplification.
Expression levels for 17157 genes in 411 gbm cases (Agilent microarray).
